de.gnwi.spices

Class PointInSpace

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gnwi.spices.PointInSpace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPointInSpace

    public class PointInSpace
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPointInSpace
    This class represents a point in space. It is defined by its x, y and z coordinate.
    Author:
    Achim Zielesny
